statements: UPDATE voice_data_patterns SET audio_file_path = '/path/to/audio/file1.wav', transcription = 'Sample transcription 1' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE voice_data_patterns SET transcription = 'Sample transcription 2', audio_file_path = '/path/to/audio/file2.wav' WHERE voice_sample_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE voice_data_patterns SET audio_file_path = '/path/to/audio1.wav', transcription = 'Sample transcription 1' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE voice_data_patterns SET voice_sample_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000', audio_file_path = '/path/to/audio2.wav', transcription = 'Sample transcription 2' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE voice_data_patterns SET voice_pattern = '{"pattern": "speech"}' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE speech_recognition_accuracy SET recognized_text = 'Hello' WHERE audio_id = 2;
UPDATE voice_data_patterns SET audio_file_path = 'example/path/file1.wav', timestamp = '2022-09-01 12:00:00', voice_pattern = '{"pattern": "example pattern 1"}' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE speech_recognition_accuracy SET recognized_text = 'Updated recognized text 2', confidence_level = 0.85 WHERE audio_id = 2;
UPDATE voice_data_patterns SET audio_data = 'new audio data', timestamp = '2022-09-15 10:30:00' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE speech_recognition_accuracy SET confidence_level = 0.8, accuracy_score = 0.7 WHERE audio_id = 5;
UPDATE voice_data_patterns SET audio_data = 'new_audio_data', timestamp = '2022-10-20 15:30:00' WHERE user_id = 101
UPDATE speech_recognition_accuracy SET accuracy_score = 0.95, confidence_level = 0.85, recognition_status = 'Success', processing_time = 12.5 WHERE audio_id = 201
UPDATE voice_data SET transcription = 'Updated transcription' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE data_analysis SET analysis_result = '{"sentiment": "positive"}' WHERE analysis_id = '987e6543-e21b-43d1-b654-123745632100';
UPDATE voice_data SET transcription = 'Enhanced audio transcription' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE user_profiles SET email = 'updatedemail@example.com', last_name = 'Doe' WHERE first_name = 'John'
UPDATE voice_samples SET sample_timestamp = '2022-05-15 08:30:00' WHERE sample_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE recognition_logs SET log_message = 'Recognition successful' WHERE log_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE voice_samples SET sample_timestamp = '2022-01-01 12:00:00' WHERE sample_id = 'c53bce2f-26bb-4fb0-a80c-140373d0e3ce';
UPDATE users SET user_name = 'John Doe', user_email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE user_id = '782c4967-5534-4c3a-b175-898f6f37dec3';
